Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Tangipahoa -- 10 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Tangipahoa Proposition
(Tax Millage)

Summary:  Ten (10) year, ten (10) mills levy of property tax dedicated for the purpose of providing fire protection to the inhabitants of the Village of Tangipahoa.
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Tangipahoa, Louisiana, be authorized to levy a tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation within said Village of Tangipahoa for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2012 and ending after the tax collection for the year 2021, which shall be dedicated solely to providing fire protection to the inhabitants of said Village, with an estimated revenue for its first year of $9,000.00?
